Ammy

Karan Singh Grover (born 23 February 1982) is an Indian television actor and model. He began his television career in Ekta Kapoor's "Kitni Mast Hai Zindagi" on MTV India. He is currently playing Dr. Armaan Mallik in "Dill Mill Gaye" on STAR One.

Television

He has also acted in serials like "Kasautii Zindagii Ki" on STAR Plus, "Solhah Singaar" on Sahara One, and "C.I.D." on Sony Entertainment Television. He was a host on the STAR One reality television series "Zara Nachke Dikha", along with Shweta Gulati.

Personal life

He is sikh and originally from Saudi Arabia.He is dating actress Sharaddha Nigam. He has acted in movies such as "Bhram" with Dino Morea and Chetan Hansraj. He also revealed his younger brother is a singer .He did his schooling from International Indian School . He believes in numerology and thus added Grover at the back of his name .He is listed no. 7 among the top 10 bachelors of tellywood .He was previously dating actress Barkha Bisht.. He holds a degree of Hotel Management. He was going to participate in Nach Baliye 4 but due to problems with his previous commitments and dates problems,Shradda and him will no longer a part of NB4. It was revealed that he couldn't do it because he was filming for his debut film. He has a cousin like-brother acting in the new Star One television serial, Miley Jab Hum Tum, whose name is Jas Karan. Karan Singh Grover was seen hosting the reality dance competition between boys and girls, Zara Nachke Dikha, along with co-host Shweta Gulati.
